name: OnePlus Nord Buds 2r True Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience clear sound and deep bass with OnePlus Nord Buds 2r. Designed for long-lasting comfort and equipped with fast pairing and low latency for an immersive wireless experience.

name: ASUS TUF Gaming F15 Laptop
description: Power through games and multitasking with the ASUS TUF Gaming F15. Featuring Intel i7 processor, RTX graphics, and a high-refresh-rate display, it's built for serious performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy M14 5G
description: Stay connected with blazing-fast 5G speeds on the Samsung Galaxy M14. With a large battery, powerful processor, and vivid display, it's perfect for everyday use and entertainment.

name: LG 260 L Double Door Refrigerator
description: Keep your food fresh and organized with the LG 260 L Double Door Refrigerator. Features include auto defrost, inverter compressor, and toughened glass shelves.

name: Canon EOS 1500D DSLR Camera
description: Capture memories in high detail with the Canon EOS 1500D. Ideal for beginners, it offers a 24.1MP sensor, WiFi connectivity, and full manual control options.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: The Apple MacBook Air M2 is ultrathin and powerful, equipped with the next-gen M2 chip, Retina display, and all-day battery life — perfect for work, play, or creativity on the go.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: Experience next-gen gaming with the Sony PlayStation 5. Enjoy lightning-fast load times, stunning visuals, and an immersive DualSense controller.

name: Mi 43 Inch Smart Android LED TV
description: Enjoy cinematic viewing with the Mi 43 Inch Smart LED TV. It features Android TV, PatchWall UI, Full HD display, and built-in Chromecast.

name: Noise ColorFit Icon 2 Smartwatch
description: The Noise ColorFit Icon 2 blends style and performance. It offers heart rate monitoring, customizable watch faces, and smart notifications for daily convenience.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i
description: Lightweight and powerful, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i offers smooth performance with Intel Core processors, fast SSD storage, and a sleek design.

name: Boult Z40 True Wireless Earbuds
description: Lightweight and powerful, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i offers smooth performance with Intel Core processors, fast SSD storage, and a sleek design.

description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 offers an immersive 10.5'' display, Dolby Atmos sound, and seamless performance for learning, entertainment, and productivity.

name: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ Neckband
description: The boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+ is a neckband-style Bluetooth earphone offering 40 hours of playback, fast charging, and IPX7 water resistance — ideal for workouts.

name: JBL Go 3 Wireless Ultra Portable Speaker
description: Compact and rugged, the JBL Go 3 offers powerful audio in a waterproof and dustproof design. Perfect for on-the-go music lovers.

name: HP DeskJet 2331 All-in-One Printer
description: The HP DeskJet 2331 is an affordable all-in-one printer for home needs. Print, scan, and copy with ease using USB connectivity and compact design.

name: Redmi Note 12 5G
description: Redmi Note 12 5G brings next-gen speed with a Snapdragon processor, AMOLED display, and 5000mAh battery — perfect for power users on a budget.

name: Apple Magic Mouse (Wireless, Rechargeable)
description: The Apple Magic Mouse is sleek, rechargeable, and perfect for Mac users. Multi-touch support lets you swipe and scroll effortlessly with minimal design.
